email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a shipment of 85,000 MT of iron ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao. The cargo is ready for loading by March 25th. Could you provide a freight quote on CIF terms? Additionally, please confirm the laycan and any vessel specifications you might have available.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN TRADER (DWT: 92,000, LOA: 229m) for your shipment. The starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT on CIF terms. The laycan is March 25-30. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for the quick response. USD 18.50 seems a bit high compared to the current market rates. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 17.75 per MT? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I can offer USD 17.90 per MT, which is a competitive rate given the current market conditions. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Alex Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

USD 17.90 works for us. Please confirm the laycan remains March 25-30 and send over the summary of terms for our review.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Here is the summary of terms:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN TRADER
- Cargo: 85,000 MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: March 25-30
- Freight: USD 17.90 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm your acceptance.

Best regards,
Alex Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Summary of Terms - Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

We accept the terms as outlined. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements and keep us updated on the vessel's status.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee
